measure_type.en: Import or export endangered species check

sub_text.en: There are criminal offences associated with moving or trading CITES-controlled species if you donâ€™t have a valid permit or certificate. You could be liable to a prison sentence of up to 7 years, an unlimited fine, or both. If your goods are covered by the Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora (CITES), you need:
